ptxt.intxrefpoff: Valve and Cylinder Head Disassembly and Reassembly:J24B

servinfosub.title: Valve Spring Free Length and Preload

item.ptxt: Check each valve springs for breakage or weakening.
Measure valve spring free length and preload.
If measured value is less than limit, replace valve spring.

attention3.ptxt: Weakened valve springs can cause chatter, not to mention possibility of reducing power output due to gas leakage caused by decreased seating pressure.

spec.title: Valve spring preload when compressed to 41 mm (1.61 in.)
spec.ptxt: Standard: 170 – 196 N (17.4 kgf – 19.9 kgf, 38.3 lbf – 44.0 lbf)

spec.title: Valve spring preload when compressed to 31.2 mm (1.23 in.)

servinfosub.title: Spring Squareness
servinfosub.ptxt: Use a square and surface plate to check each spring for squareness in terms of clearance between end of valve spring and square. Valve springs found to exhibit a larger clearance than limit must be replaced.
